mapper.select: SELECT promotion_message, introduction FROM crews WHERE is_promotion = 'Y'

select c.crew_number, c.crew_name, c.introduction, c.INTEREST_CATEGORY, c.image, g.gu_name, cm_count.crew_members_count from crews c join gues g on c.gu_number = g.gu_number join ( select c.crew_number, count(c.crew_number) + 1 as crew_members_count from crews c left join crew_members cm on c.crew_number = cm.crew_number group by c.crew_number ) cm_count on c.crew_number = cm_count.crew_number ORDER BY c.crew_number desc

select c.crew_number, c.crew_name, c.introduction, c.INTEREST_CATEGORY, c.image, g.gu_name, cm_count.crew_members_count from crews c join gues g on c.gu_number = g.gu_number join ( select c.crew_number, count(c.crew_number) + 1 as crew_members_count from crews c left join crew_members cm on c.crew_number = cm.crew_number group by c.crew_number ) cm_count on c.crew_number = cm_count.crew_number where c.crew_number = #{crewNumber}
SELECT u.name, u.nickname FROM crews c JOIN users u ON c.crew_leader_id = u.user_id WHERE c.crew_number = #{crewNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crews (crew_number, crew_name, crew_leader_id, introduction, interest_category, age_range, image, promotion_message, is_promotion, gu_number) VALUES ( crews_seq.nextval, #{crewName}, #{crewLeaderId}, #{introduction}, #{interestCategory}, #{ageRange}, #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotionMessage}, #{isPromotion}, #{guNumber} )
mapper.update: UPDATE crews SET crew_name = #{crewName}, crew_leader_id = #{crewLeaderId}, introduction = #{introduction}, interest_category = #{interestCategory}, age_range = #{ageRange}, image = #{image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promotion_message = #{promotionMessage}, is_promotion = #{isPromotion}, gu_number = #{guNumber} WHERE crew_number = #{crewNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT count(crew_number) as comment_count FROM crew_comments WHERE crew_number = #{crewNumber}

SELECT u.nickname, cc.crew_comment FROM crew_comments cc JOIN crew_members cm ON cc.crew_member_number = cm.crew_member_number JOIN users u ON cm.crew_member_id = u.user_id WHERE cc.crew_number = #{crewNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew_applies (crew_apply_number, crew_number, user_id, introduction) VALUES (CREW_APPLIES_SEQ.nextval, #{crewNumber}, #{userId}, #{introduction})
mapper.select: select au.profile_image, au.nickname, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, au.birthdate) / 12) as age, au.gender, SUBSTR(c.city_name,1,2) as city, ca.introduction from crew_applies ca join users au on au.USER_ID = ca.USER_ID join gues g on g.GU_NUMBER = au.GU_NUMBER join cities c on c.city_number = g.city_number where ca.crew_number = #{crewNumber}

select au.profile_image, au.nickname, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, au.birthdate) / 12) as age, au.gender, SUBSTR(c.city_name,1,2) as city from crews c join crew_members cmm on c.crew_number = cmm.crew_number join users au on au.user_id = cmm.CREW_MEMBER_ID join gues g on g.GU_NUMBER = au.GU_NUMBER join cities c on c.CITY_NUMBER = g.CITY_NUMBER where c.crew_number = #{crewNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew_meeting_participants (crew_participant_number, crew_meeting_number, crew_member_number, apply_date) VALUES (CREW_MEETING_PARTICIPANTS_SEQ.nextval, #{crewMeetingNumber}, #{crewMemberNumber}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select u.profile_image, u.name, u.nickname from users u, crew_meeting_participants cmp, crew_members cmb where cmp.crew_meeting_number= #{crewMeetingNumber} and cmp.crew_member_number=cmb.crew_member_number and u.user_id = cmb.crew_member_id

select u.profile_image, u.name, u.nickname from users u, crew_meetings cmt, crew_members cmb where cmt.crew_meeting_number=#{crewMeetingNumber} and cmt.crew_meeting_host_number=cmb.crew_member_number and u.user_id = cmb.crew_member_id
mapper.insert: insert into crew_meetings(crew_meeting_number, title, content, meeting_date, max_member, crew_number, crew_meeting_host_number, gu_number) values(crew_meetings_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content} , #{meetingDate}, #{maxMember}, #{crewNumber}, #{crewMeetingHostNumber}, #{guNumber})
mapper.select: select image, title, content from crew_meetings where crew_meeting_number = #{crewMeetingNumber}

SELECT m.title, m.meeting_date, g.gu_name, u.name AS host_name FROM crew_meetings m JOIN gues g ON m.gu_number = g.gu_number JOIN crew_members mb ON m.crew_meeting_host_number = mb.crew_member_number JOIN users u ON mb.crew_member_id = u.user_id WHERE m.crew_number = #{crewNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into crew_members(crew_member_number, crew_number, crew_member_id, join_date) values(crew_members_seq.nextval, #{crewNumber}, #{crewMemberId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: delete crew_members where crew_member_number = #{crewMemberNumber} and crew_number = #{crewNumber}
